::Killfest::

Killfest listens to DrillBit give Scorponok some orders and watches 
Scorponok fly off. He looks up at the cave cealing, thinking 
something over.

"Darkfate," he finally says, "Do you have any space-worthy shuttles 
in your base? I believe I can make a good use of one or two."

He frowns. Maybe some of his team had managed to escape when they had 
been arrested by the Maximals...




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He opens a panel on his chest, pulls ous a wire, and plugs it into
> Scorponok's head. The data is transfered, and DrillBit returns the 
wire
> to himself.
> "now when you reach Lond, switch your voice to this program. Simple
> voice commands will tell the ship to de-cloak, and to open the 
hatch.
> Good luck."
